src_original: striya pratyakṣataḥ kṛtvā samukhe copaveśya hi |
dvābhyām anyonyarāgeṇa gāḍham anyonyam īkṣayet ||  tato dṛṣṭisukha dhyāyan tiṣṭhed ekāgramānasaḥ |
tva me putro'si bhartāsi tva me bhrātā pitā
saptabhiḥ puruṣair dāsas tva me kheṭasaceṭakaḥ |  tva me kapardakakrītas tavāha svāminī matā ||  patec caraṇayos tasyā nirbhara sampuṭāñjaliḥ ||
tva me mātāpitur bhāryā tva me ca bhāgineyikā ||  bhaginīputrabhāryā ca tva svasā tva ca māmikā |
